Class HelperCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.youama.nexus.parser.collector.HelperCollector

  • public final class HelperCollector
extends Object
    Constants of this class should be used for Collector objects.
    Since:
    2015.07.12.
    Author:
    David Belicza - 87.bdavid@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LINK_ALL
      Gathers all links.
      static int LINK_NO_FOLLOW
      Gathers all links what have nofollow value in the rel attribute.
      static int LINK_VALID
      Gathers all correct links.
      static int LINK_VALID_NO_RESOURCES
      Gathers all correct links what are point to another pages not resources like css, js, etc.
      static int TEXT_ALL
      Gathers all text from the HTML source.
      static int TEXT_BODY
      Gathers all text from the body of the HTML source.
